faqs.q: How many calories in a Chipotle burrito with chicken?
faqs.a: About 1080 kcal for a standard build with rice, beans, and toppings.

faqs.q: What are the macros for calories in chipotle burrito?
faqs.a: Roughly 120g carbs, 50g protein, 40g fat, and 12g fiber.

faqs.q: Is a Chipotle burrito high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, around 2200 mg per burrito due to seasonings and cheese.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in chipotle burrito?
faqs.a: Skip cheese, sour cream, and rice; opt for salad base to cut ~300-400 kcal.

faqs.q: Calories in Chipotle steak burrito vs chicken?
faqs.a: Similar at ~1050 kcal, but steak adds more fat; check customizations.
